IActivationFunctionFactory
public interface
IActivationFunctionFactory​<T>
where T : struct
DefaultActivationFunctionFactory

Represents a factory for obtaining instances of IActivationFunction{T}.

Type Parameter
T

Neural net numeric data type.

Functions
GetActivationFunction

)

Get an activation function instance for the given activation function name/ID.

Parameter

string
